content.query:
SELECT TOP 1
     JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[0].skillId') AS skillId
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[0].area') AS area
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[0].solutionArea') AS solutionArea
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[0].category') AS category
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[0].practice') AS practice
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[0].buildingBlock') AS buildingBlocka
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[0].name') AS name
    ,jsonContent
FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://minastirith.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/01-fresh/skills-json/skills.json',FORMAT = 'CSV',FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b') WITH (jsonContent varchar(MAX)) AS [result]
union 
SELECT TOP 1
     JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[1].skillId') AS skillId
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[1].area') AS area
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[1].solutionArea') AS solutionArea
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[1].category') AS category
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[1].practice') AS practice
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[1].buildingBlock') AS buildingBlock
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[1].name') AS name
    ,jsonContent
FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://minastirith.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/01-fresh/skills-json/skills.json', FORMAT = 'CSV',FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b') WITH (jsonContent varchar(MAX)) AS [result]
union
SELECT TOP 1
     JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[2].skillId') AS skillId
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[2].area') AS area
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[2].solutionArea') AS solutionArea
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[2].category') AS category
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[2].practice') AS practice
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[2].buildingBlock') AS buildingBlock
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[2].name') AS name
    ,jsonContent
FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://minastirith.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/01-fresh/skills-json/skills.json', FORMAT = 'CSV',FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b') WITH (jsonContent varchar(MAX)) AS [result]
union
SELECT TOP 1
     JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[3].skillId') AS skillId
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[3].area') AS area
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[3].solutionArea') AS solutionArea
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[3].category') AS category
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[3].practice') AS practice
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[3].buildingBlock') AS buildingBlock
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[3].name') AS name
    ,jsonContent
FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://minastirith.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/01-fresh/skills-json/skills.json', FORMAT = 'CSV',FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b') WITH (jsonContent varchar(MAX)) AS [result]
union
SELECT TOP 1
     JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[4].skillId') AS skillId
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[4].area') AS area
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[4].solutionArea') AS solutionArea
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[4].category') AS category
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[4].practice') AS practice
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[4].buildingBlock') AS buildingBlock
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[4].name') AS name
    ,jsonContent
FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://minastirith.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/01-fresh/skills-json/skills.json', FORMAT = 'CSV',FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b') WITH (jsonContent varchar(MAX)) AS [result]
union
SELECT TOP 1
     JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[5].skillId') AS skillId
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[5].area') AS area
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[5].solutionArea') AS solutionArea
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[5].category') AS category
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[5].practice') AS practice
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[5].buildingBlock') AS buildingBlock
    ,JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.skills[5].name') AS name
    ,jsonContent
FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://minastirith.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/01-fresh/skills-json/skills.json', FORMAT = 'CSV',FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b') WITH (jsonContent varchar(MAX)) AS [result]
